rule.info: Windows Defender 信息事件
rule.description: Windows Defender informational event

rule.info: Windows Defender 警告事件
rule.description: Windows Defender warning event

rule.info: Windows Defender 错误事件
rule.description: Windows Defender error event

rule.info: Windows Defender 多次错误事件
rule.description: Multiple Windows Defender error events

rule.info: Windows Defender 多次警告事件
rule.description: Multiple Windows Defender warning events

rule.info: 短时间多个 Windows Defender 错误事件
rule.description: Short-time multiple Windows Defender error events

rule.info: 短时间多个 Windows Defender 警告事件
rule.description: Short-time multiple Windows Defender warning events

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件扫描已启动
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware scan started

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件扫描完成
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware scan finished

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件扫描在完成之前已停止
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware scan was stopped before it finished

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件扫描已暂停
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware scan paused

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件扫描已恢复
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware scan resumed

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件扫描失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware scan failed

rule.info: Windows Defender：反恶意软件引擎发现 $(win.eventdata.severityName) 恶意软件或其他可能不需要的软件
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine found $(win.eventdata.severityName) malware or other potentially unwanted software

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台执行了一项操作以保护您的系统免受恶意软件或其他可能不需要的软件的侵害
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform performed an action to protect your system from malware or other potentially unwanted software

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台未能采取措施保护您的系统免受恶意软件或其他可能不需要的软件的侵害
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform failed to perform an action to protect your system from malware or other potentially unwanted software

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台从 $(win.eventdata.path) 的隔离区中恢复了一个项目
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform restored an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台无法从 $(win.eventdata.path) 处的隔离区恢复项目
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform could not restore an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台从 $(win.eventdata.path) 的隔离区中删除了一个项目
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform deleted an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台无法从 $(win.eventdata.path) 的隔离区中删除项目
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform could not delete an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台删除了恶意软件和其他可能不需要的软件的历史记录
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform deleted history of malware and other potentially unwanted software

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台无法删除恶意软件和其他可能不需要的软件的历史记录
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform could not delete history of malware and other potentially unwanted software

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台检测到可疑的 $(win.eventdata.detectionType) 行为 ($(win.eventdata.processName))
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform detected suspicious $(win.eventdata.detectionType) behaviour ($(win.eventdata.processName))

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台检测到 $(win.eventdata.severityName) 可能不需要的软件 ($(win.eventdata.processName))
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform detected $(win.eventdata.severityName) potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.processName))

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台执行了一项操作以保护您免受潜在有害软件的侵害 ($(win.eventdata.processName))
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform performed an action to protect you from potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.processName))

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台未能执行保护您免受潜在有害软件侵害的操作 ($(win.eventdata.processName))
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform failed performing an action to protect you from potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.processName))

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台在尝试对可能不需要的软件执行操作时遇到严重错误
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform encountered a critical error when attempting to perform an action over the potentially unwanted software

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台已推断出威胁资源的哈希值
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform has deduced the hashes for a threat resource

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台正在运行并处于健康状态
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform is running and in a healthy state

rule.info: Windows Defender: Endpoint Protection 客户端运行状况报告
rule.description: Windows Defender: Endpoint Protection client health report

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件定义已成功更新
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware definitions updated successfully

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件定义更新失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware definition update failed

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎更新成功
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine updated successfully

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎更新失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine update failed

rule.info: Windows Defender: 尝试加载反恶意软件定义时出错
rule.description: Windows Defender: Error while attempting to load antimalware definitions

rule.info: Windows Defender: 尝试加载反恶意软件引擎时出错，因为反恶意软件平台已过时
rule.description: Windows Defender: Error while attempting to load antimalware engine because the antimalware platform is outdated

rule.info: Windows Defender: 尝试更新反恶意软件平台时出错
rule.description: Windows Defender: Error while attempting to update antimalware platform

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台即将更新
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform will soon be updated

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎使用动态签名服务获取附加定义
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine used Dynamic Signature Service to get additional definitions

rule.info: Windows Defender: DSS 删除了过时的动态定义
rule.description: Windows Defender: DSS deleted the outdated dynamic definitions

rule.info: Windows Defender: 尝试使用动态签名服务时出错
rule.description: Windows Defender: Error while attempting to use Dynamic Signature Service

rule.info: Windows Defender: 动态签名服务删除了所有动态定义
rule.description: Windows Defender: Dynamic Signature Service deleted all dynamic definitions

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎下载了一个干净的文件
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine downloaded a clean file

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎未能下载干净的文件
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine failed to download a clean file

rule.info: Windows Defender: 已下载反恶意软件引擎并配置为在下次系统重新启动时脱机运行
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine was downloaded and is configured to run offline on the next system restart

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎无法下载和配置离线扫描
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine was unable to download and configure an offline scan

rule.info: Windows Defender: 对此操作系统的反恶意软件支持即将结束
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware support for this Operating System will soon end

rule.info: Windows Defender: 此操作系统的反恶意软件支持已结束
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware support for this Operating System has ended

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件引擎不再支持此操作系统
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine no longer supports this Operating System

rule.info: Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) 实时保护遇到错误失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) real-time protection encountered an error and failed

rule.info: Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) 从故障中恢复的实时保护
rule.description: Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) real-time protection recovered from a failure

rule.info: Windows Defender: 启用防病毒实时保护
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus real-time protection is enabled

rule.info: Windows Defender: 防病毒实时保护已禁用
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus real-time protection is disabled

rule.info: Windows Defender: 防病毒实时保护功能配置已更改
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus real-time protection feature configuration has changed

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台功能配置已更改
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform feature configuration changed

rule.info: Windows Defender: 由于 $(win.eventdata.resource) 处的 $(win.eventdata.failureType)，反恶意软件引擎遇到错误并失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware engine encountered an error and failed because of $(win.eventdata.failureType) at $(win.eventdata.resource)

rule.info: Windows Defender: 已启用针对恶意软件和其他可能不需要的软件的防病毒扫描
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for malware and other potentially unwanted software is enabled

rule.info: Windows Defender: 已禁用恶意软件和其他可能不需要的软件的防病毒扫描
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for malware and other potentially unwanted software is disabled

rule.info: Windows Defender: 已启用病毒的防病毒扫描
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for viruses is enabled

rule.info: Windows Defender: 病毒的防病毒扫描已禁用
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for viruses is disabled

rule.info: Windows Defender: 反恶意软件平台即将到期
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform will expire soon

rule.info: Windows Defender: 由于错误 $(win.eventdata.errorCode)，反恶意软件平台已过期
rule.description: Windows Defender: Antimalware platform is expired due to error $(win.eventdata.errorCode)

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：没有内存
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: NO MEMORY

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的输入数据
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD INPUT DATA

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的配置
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD CONFIGURATION

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：隔离失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: QUARANTINE FAILED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：需要重新启动
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: REBOOT REQUIRED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：未发现威胁
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: THREAT NOT FOUND

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：需要全面扫描
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: FULL SCAN REQUIRED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：需要手动步骤
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: MANUAL STEPS REQUIRED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：不支持删除
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: REMOVE NOT SUPPORTED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：删除低中禁用
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: REMOVE LOW MEDIUM DISABLED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：需要重新扫描
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: RESCAN REQUIRED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：需要CALLISTO
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CALLISTO REQUIRED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：平台过时
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: PLATFORM OUTDATED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：UI整合基础
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: UI CONSOLIDATION BASE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：操作失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: ACTIONS FAILED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：没有引擎
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: NO ENGINE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：主动威胁
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: ACTIVE THREATS

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：没有网络连接
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: NO INTERNET CONNECTION

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：LUA 取消
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: LUA CANCELLATION

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：代码LUA 取消
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE LUA CANCELLED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：代码已经关闭
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE ALREADY SHUTDOWN

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：代码异步调用挂起
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE ASYNC CALL PENDING

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：代码取消
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE CANCELLED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：代码无目标
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE NO TARGETOS

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：代码错误的正则表达式
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE BAD REGEXP

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：测试引起的错误
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: TEST INDUCED ERROR

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：SIG 备份已禁用
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: SIG BACKUP DISABLED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的初始化模块
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD INIT MODULES

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DATABASE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的UFS
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD UFS

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的输入数据
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD INPUT DATA

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的全局存储
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD GLOBAL STORAGE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：过时
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: OBSOLETE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：不支持
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: NOT SUPPORTED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：没有更多的项目
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: NO MORE ITEMS

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：重复的扫描 ID
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: DUPLICATE SCAN ID

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：扫描 ID错误
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD SCAN ID

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的用户数据库版本
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD USER DB VERSION

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：恢复失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: RESTORE FAILED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：操作错误
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD ACTION

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：未发现
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: NOT FOUND

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误处理
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD EHANDLE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：未加载 RELO 内核
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: RELO KERNEL NOT LOADED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库：打开
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DB: OPEN

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库：标题
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DB: HEADER

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库：旧的引擎
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DB: OLD ENGINE

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库：内容
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DB: CONTENT

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库：未签名
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DB: NOT SIGNED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：错误的数据库：标题
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD DB: HEADER

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：删除失败
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: REMOVE FAILED

rule.info: Windows Defender: 错误：扫描中止
rule.description: Windows Defender: ERROR: SCAN ABORTED
